title: Cozy  Beautiful 2 Bedroom/ 2 Bathroom Available
description: Beautiful 1 Bedroom/ 1 Bathroom Available Now in! This 1 bedroom, 1 bath home is loaded with character. The first floor features original hardwood flooring, a spacious living room, dining room, kitchen with gas oven/stove, laundry room with washer/dryer, as well as a lovely front porch and garden area. The upstairs continues with the original hardwood, and features the two bedrooms and 1 bath as well as hallway closet storage. The room flows into an open kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and ample cabinet space, where you'll be able to cook like a chef while entertaining your guests. Looking for a room to rent by August. I work in San Marino and would like to live close to work. Im flexible on location as long as its not too far away. I'm single and gay. Im a Non-smoker, I have no pets but Im ok if you have them. I don't do drugs or party. Im a quiet person. Im a live in Caregiver for an elderly and stay with her 4 days a week. Im off Tues-Thursday every week. So I would only be home 3 days a week. I would prefer furnished if possible. Im looking to pay around $550 per month utilities included and would perfer month-to-month if possible but plan to stay for a year or more if its good for you. Feel free to email me or ask any questions. I am a 20 year old Latino partnered with a 26 year old latino. We are a gay couple, family oriented, clean, busy college students, and full time workers. Most of our time would be spent commuting and/or attending work and/or school. We are super quiet, clean, simple, and drama free, just looking to live with quiet, nice folk, looking for about $550/month. If you're interested or would like to know more from either one of us please feel free to reach out to me.

title: Beautiful home three bed room and two bat room
description: Beautiful home located on almost 1/2 acre of serene, wooded setting in the highly sought after Blossom Hill neighborhood. This ideal location perfectly balances accessibility and privacy. The home is a blend of the original one story rancher plus a two story addition, plus many improved features. The original one story wing of the home has been lovingly updated and improved to include a gorgeous custom built kitchen (by Horizon Kitchens) with plentiful cabinetry space, granite counters, gas range, and well-planned workspace with island and prep areas. This space also includes a sunny breakfast area and is open to the dining area through to the huge Sunroom addition. This open concept allows for creative freedom and can even be arranged to include an additional sitting area.  The sunroom is incredibly comfortable with high ceilings and large windows, beckoning the forest indoors. A gas fireplace keeps this generous space cozy, and a sliding door accesses the stamped concrete patio in the backyard. The rest of this level also includes two bedrooms or office spaces and a full bath. Continuing on to the two-story addition, stairs lead to the second floor bedrooms and baths. This wing contains the huge Primary Bedroom and ensuite Primary Bath, as well as a private balcony to enjoy! This floor also encompasses three additional bedrooms and a Hallway Bath. The first floor of this wing is the 2 car garage with a laundry room and in-law quarters tucked behind. The in-law apartment on the first floor has a private entrance and includes a kitchenette and private bath. This would be a great space for guests or possible office space, allowing plenty of privacy while still connected to the main house through the garage. Heading back downstairs, the renovated basement forms a first floor wing with a comfortable family room with plenty of space for entertaining with a wet bar and additional sitting area. Some of the upgrades throughout this wonderful home include windows and door replacements, three separate heating and cooling zones, exterior siding, Manny Beiler kitchen, the refinished basement, the sunroom addition, and two new separate furnaces, one for the main house and the other for bedrooms and in-law quarters. Outside, there is plenty of yard space for play and a central patio for relaxing and entertaining. Trees and shrubs surround the home and allow for a beautiful, private space in every season! This great Manheim Township location has easy access to major highways, shopping, and schools, and is centrally situated between Lititz and Lancaster City. Come take a look and see this forest gem for yourself! text me: paolafaba245g_mail.com

title: Furnished 4BR, 2BA House with Parking
description:
Fully furnished, fully renovated house with 4BR, 2BA will be available August 1. The house is located on Umbria  Street, ten minutes from Main Street and two blocks from the Ivy Ridge train Station.  In addition to being a great house, it also has parking directly behind the house, which is unheard of in Manayunk!
The house was fully renovated in 2017, so everything is updated and in great condition. Kitchen has new cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.  Open-concept living and dining room area with recessed lighting and wood floors.  The living room is furnished with a sofa, love seat, coffee and end tables and a new flat screen tv and electric fireplace.  The dining area has a table and six chairs.  Furniture can be removed if you don't need it.
The second and third floors are carpeted wall-to-wall.  Each floor has two bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The bathrooms have been fully renovated and include step-in showers.  New washer and dryer in the basement with plenty of room for storage.  Also covered rear porch and nice fenced back yard which leads to rear parking.
The house is very nice and well maintained by the current tenants.    The house will be available in early August before the start of the school year.
This is an awesome house in a great location which will not last long!  If you are interested, send some information about you or your group and when you would be available to check it out. Also feel free to ask any other questions.  No smoking or vaping permitted and no pets.

title: 2 Bedroom House with Office and Laundry
description:
This two bedroom house with bonus office/nursery, sits on a small, quiet street between the Whole Foods and Palumbo Park in Bella Vista.
Throughout the house you will find high ceilings, new triple-pane windows, exposed brick, and hardwood floors. The first floor features a living room, dining area, and kitchen that leads to an outdoor brick and mosaic patio.
Straight stairs lead you to the second floor, which features a full bathroom, a bedroom, and a second outdoor patio. Continue up another set of straight stairs to a recently renovated office/nursery and master bedroom. The basement has high ceilings, ample storage, and a washer/dryer. There is also a dishwasher, gas stove, gas radiated heating, and mini split AC units are located on each floor.
Steps away from Whole Foods, Acme, Palumbo Park, the Italian Market, and South Street restaurants and shops. Close to Center City, Penn and Jefferson, Washington Square Park, and Headhouse Square. Permit parking is very convenient.
Pets welcome, water included, tenant pays gas and electric. Credit check, first, last, and deposit required for a one-year lease, which can begin Aug 1st, Aug 15th, or Sept 1.
